original_text: Think about this. Some of you have let people baptize you on behalf of believers who have already died. But if dead people do not rise up to a new life, there is no reason to baptize anyone on their behalf.
korean_text: 만일 죽은 자들이 도무지 다시 살아나지 못하면 죽은 자들을 위하여 세례를 받는 자들이 무엇을 하겠느냐 어찌하여 그들을 위하여 세례를 받느냐

sentences.original_text: Some of you have let people baptize you
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분 중 일부는 사람들이 여러분을 세례하게 하였습니다.

sentences.original_text: on behalf of believers who have already died.
But if dead people do not rise up
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 죽은 사람들이 다시 일어나지 않는다면,

sentences.original_text: there is no reason to baptize anyone
